plot: A 92-year-old man decides that the time has come to say goodbye to all that is most important in his life, including her lover who is 55 years younger than him.
title: A Despedida
plot_es: A 92-year-old man decides that the time has come to say goodbye to all that is most important in his life, including her lover who is 55 years younger than him.
plot_en: A 92-year-old man decides that the time has come to say goodbye to all that is most important in his life, including her lover who is 55 years younger than him.
